title: Nintendo's E3 Plans - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.09.19
description:
Get started for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Get $30 off 23andMe’s Health + Ancestry Kit at http://23andme.com/games

Greg and Andrea talk about Nintendo's newly announced E3 2019 plans.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:35 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Tom Bock, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:35 - Nintendo’s E3 Plan
00:07:10 Best Friend Q. - When do you think we will see a new switch hardware be released? - Evan M
00:12:43 - Days Gone Selling GREAT in Japan, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:18:50 - EA and the future of releasing games, Andy Chalk @ PCGAMER
00:24:30- Gearbox Responds to Assault Allegation, Emma Kent @ Eurogamer
00:27:32 - SEGA Buys Two Point Hospital Dev, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:28:55 - Konami Doesn’t Need Us, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:34:40 - Out today
00:37:03 -  Hims
00:38:34 - 23&Me
00:39:50 - STEVE SAYLOR SPEAKS!
Reader mail   -
00:42:17 - Do you think next month's Bethesda conference is going to be a shit-show? - GillyBrums
00:52:13 - Squad Up: Tom Caswell(Xbox) - Great BriTom
00:55:26 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Nathan Brandt
